txt.en: Clear the tower courtyard of defenders
Approach the scout to return to camp
Approach the scout to return to camp.

A particularly brutal Orc captain has made the old tower of Tharbad his base of operations.\n\nThe mission giver has asked you to clear the courtyard approaching the tower of defenders to open the way for an attack on the tower itself.
Clear the tower courtyard of defenders.
With the courtyard cleared, a scout approaches
